resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74331</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74331</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d1b1935e-d8e6-4cd0-b5ea-c3b471779381#1#10</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A gazdasági világválság</string>
            <string language="en">The Great Depression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Große Tiefstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Grande Dépression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Depression Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Depressione Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεγάλη οικονομική κρίση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Gran Depresión</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Ismerkedés a világválság okaival, lefolyásával</string>
            <string language="en">Getting acquainted with reasons, course of the Great Depression</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">tőzsdekrach,  világgazdaság,  túltermelés,  </string>
            <string language="en">stock market crash, world trade, over-production</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitgeteilt mit Gründen, Kurs erhalten des großen 
Tiefstands</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obtenant mis au courant des raisons, cours de la 
grande dépression</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Começando familiarizado com as razões, curso do
depression grande</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottenendo informato dei motivi, corso della 
depressione grande</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξοικειωμένος με τους λόγους, πορεία της μεγάλης 
οικονομικής κρίσης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Consiguiendo conocido de las razones, curso de la 
gran depresión</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Börsesystemabsturz, Welthandel, Überproduktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">panne totale de marché boursier, commerce mondial, 
surproduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ruído elétrico de mercado conservado em estoque, 
comércio de mundo, over-production</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arresto di mercato azionario, commercio mondiale, 
sovrapproduzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντριβή χρηματιστηρίου, παγκόσμιο εμπόριο, υπερπαραγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">caída de la bolsa, comercio mundial, 
superproducción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">17-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74331</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
